tropical Highland avocado that is
usually it's small in size and really
high in fat there's a Guatemalan lowland
avocado which is generally bigger in
size and a little bit more fibrous and
coarse in texture and lastly the
Guatemalan Highland is also subtropical
group of avocados which is somewhere in
the middle it has a nice smooth textured

inside of the fruit which if you guys

avocados are actually fruits is much
